Title: Provides for a 75-25 percent split in the New York city transit authority's operating surplus between the authority and the Metropolitan transportation authority
Summary: Provides for a 75-25 percent split in the New York city transit authority's operating surplus between the authority and the Metropolitan transit authority where previously the split was 50-50.
LawCode: Amd ยง1219-a, Pub Auth L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public authorities law, in relation to the formula for New York city transit authority operating surplus revenue
